table.name: vtiger_servicecomments
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_servicecomments` ( `servicecommentsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `related_to` int(11) NOT NULL, `contractsid` int(11) NOT NULL, `salesorderproductsrelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `salesorderprojecttasksrelid` int(11) NOT NULL, `addtime` varchar(20) NOT NULL, `serviceid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `allocatetime` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `assignerid` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL, `remark` text, PRIMARY KEY (`servicecommentsid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
